text: A jillguero locked in a cage hanging from a window sang at night. He heard a bat from a distance his voice and, approaching him, asked him why he was singing only at night. "It's not without reason", he replied, "because I was singing during the day when I got caught, but since then I've learned to be cautious. - Well, it's not now that you should be, because you're already well caged, but it should have been before you were captured! - replied the bat. You have to be careful to avoid misfortune.
title: El murciélago y el jilguero
author: nan Esopo
